hero.subtitle: Partner with InGARSS 2026
hero.description: Join us in shaping the future of Geoscience and Remote Sensing at one of the most influential forums in the region.

aboutProgram.title: About InGARSS 2026
paragraphs: The 2026 IEEE India Geoscience and Remote Sensing Symposium (InGARSS 2026) will be held from 01–04 December 2026 in Hyderabad, India. As one of the flagship regional conferences of IEEE GRSS, InGARSS 2026 aims to be a premier forum bringing together researchers, practitioners, and industry professionals from India and across the globe.

With the theme "Digital Earth – Modeling, Mapping, and Monitoring", the symposium will feature keynote speeches, technical sessions, tutorials, exhibitions, and networking opportunities covering cutting-edge advances in geoscience and remote sensing.
All accepted and presented papers will be submitted to IEEE Xplore for publication, ensuring global visibility for your research and brand.

whySponsor.title: Why Sponsor or Exhibit at InGARSS 2026?

benefits.title: Support Academia
benefits.description: Enable public sector and academic participation at minimal cost

benefits.title: Strategic Venue
benefits.description: Engage with key stakeholders in Hyderabad - India's Cyber City and aerospace hub

benefits.title: Showcase Innovation
benefits.description: Demo your products and services to researchers, engineers, and decision-makers

packages.name: Diamond
features: Five complimentary conference registrations
One plenary talk on the opening day
One invited talk in conference sessions
Everything offered in Platinum Sponsorship

packages.name: Platinum
features: Two invited talks in conference sessions
Highest-level sponsor recognition across conference platforms
Everything offered in Gold Sponsorship

packages.name: Gold
features: Three complimentary conference registrations
Include sponsor-provided materials in conference bags
Everything offered in Silver Sponsorship

packages.name: Silver
features: Two complimentary conference registrations
Sponsor banner displayed throughout the conference
Press release with media interaction opportunity
Demo/showcase products in exhibition area
Everything offered in Bronze Sponsorship

packages.name: Bronze
features: One complimentary conference registration
Logo on all conference programs
Logo on main conference website with hyperlink
Press release in the conference media kit
Invited talk in one conference session

packages.name: Event Sponsorship
features: One complimentary conference registration
Logo on specific event promotional contents (WIE/DEIAB/YP events, etc.)
Logo on event web page with hyperlink
Press release in the event media kit
Invited talk in one event session

rows.feature: Logo on conference website with hyperlink

contact.title: Interested in Sponsoring?
contact.description: We offer flexible and customizable sponsorship packages to align with your organizational goals. Contact us to discuss how InGARSS 2026 can support your objectives.
